Who were they expecting for tea?

What train did Mr. Davenheim take on Saturday?
The 13:00 one,The 12:40 one -c,The 15:00 one
What time did Mr. Davenheim leave the house?
Nine,Half-past five -c,One
Who had a grudge against Davenheim?
Lowen -c,Ms. Davenheim,Jepp
Where did Hastings think the man was hiding?
New York,Europe,London -c
Who was Billy Kellet?
A friend,An inspector,A character -c
